summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2006 HONDA CIVIC. WHEN THE CONTACT SAT DOWN IN THE VEHICLE AND CLOSING THE DRIVER SIDE DOOR, THE DRIVER SIDE AIR BAG SUDDENLY DEPLOYED WITHOUT WARNING. DURING THE INCIDENT, THE VEHICLE WAS PARKED AND THE KEY WAS NOT INSERTED IN THE IGNITION SWITCH. THE CONTACT SUFFERED AN INJURED NECK, WHICH REQUIRED MEDICAL ATTENTION. THE CAUSE OF THE FAILURE WAS NOT DETERMINED. THE MANUFACTURER AND LOCAL DEALER (HARDEN HONDA IN ANAHEIM, CA) WERE NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 160,000.
